58096.name: {GWest{gern Sho{Gre of {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: There is a distinct lack of trees and absolute silence pervades here
on the edge of a large pond. The waters of the pond are completely still
and dark with an unknown depth.  Even the creatures in the area seem to
avoid the ominous waters.

58028.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58072.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: The waters of this large pond are completely dark and absolutely still,
making it impossible to determine its depth.  The mirror-like surface of
the water reflects the sky above, yet seems to suck any light or color
beneath the depths.  The pond reaches all the way across the secluded
valley.

58038.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58045.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.

58079.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.

58026.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x
description: This road leads north and south through the wide open Valley of the
Elves.  All about can be heard the vibrant sounds of nature.  Birdsong
floats on the warm breeze while insects hum and chirp.

58085.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: The waters of this large pond are completely dark and absolutely still,
making it impossible to determine its depth.  The mirror-like surface of
the water reflects the sky above, yet seems to suck any light or color
beneath the depths.  The pond reaches all the way across the secluded
valley.

58039.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x {BBelow the Rope Bridge{x
description: The cobblestone road leading north and south through the Valley of
the Elves passes here through a break in the ridge that encircles the
valley.  Overhead, a rope bridge spans the opening.  A rope ladder
leads up to the bridge.

58013.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58002.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58041.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass
of the Valley of the Elves swishes in a natural rhythm.  The temperature in
the valley seems to always stay temperate.  It is unclear if that is a result
of the unique geography of the area or an act of magic.

58020.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: There is a small opening here in the ridge that surrounds the entirety
of the large Valley of the Elves.  Past the opening can be seen a smaller
valley, filled with larger trees than what grow here.  There also appears
to be a large pond in the middle of that area.

58059.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.

58098.name: {GW{ges{Gt of {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.  To the east
lies a large pond, its still waters shrouded in dim light.

58031.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58091.name: {GE{gas{Gt of {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: Tall stands of trees are all about in this secluded sub-section of
the Valley of the Elves.  There is a general feeling of arcane energy
in the air and the natural elements in the area seem strengthened,
and perhaps a bit twisted, by it.  To the west lies a large pond,
its still waters shrouded in dim light.

58034.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away

58070.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x

58030.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58065.name: {GA Sm{gall Elven {wHo{Wme{x
description: This small home is comfortable and inviting.  The house is constructed
of wood that shows no sign of being cut, instead it appears to have been
almost woven into place.  There is a kitchen area with a fireplace and a
table and chairs sit in the middle of the room.  A soft bed has been
placed on the opposite side of the home from the kitchen.

58084.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: The waters of this large pond are completely dark and absolutely still,
making it impossible to determine its depth.  The mirror-like surface of
the water reflects the sky above, yet seems to suck any light or color
beneath the depths.  The pond reaches all the way across the secluded
valley.

58042.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58089.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: Tall stands of trees are all about in this secluded sub-section of
the Valley of the Elves.  There is a general feeling of arcane energy
in the air and the natural elements in the area seem strengthened,
and perhaps a bit twisted, by it.  The valley is surrounded by rock
ledges, making it difficult to get in and out of.

58088.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: This small, secluded valley is situated off of the main Valley of
the Elves.  There is a general air of magic in the area but it doesn't
feel like that of the elves.  There are many trees around and they all
grow tall, despite the relative shade of the rocky ridges surrounding
the valley.

58044.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58050.name: {*[{GElven Vi{glla{Gge Road{*]{x
description: This well maintained cobblestone road leads east and west through
the small elven settlement.  Buildings stand to the north and south
side of the road.  To the west lies a village square and the valley
can be found to the east.

58071.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: This large pond divides the secluded valley, stretching from the
northern ridge of the valley all the way to the southern.  The waters
are still and completely dark, making the depth seem eternal.  A complete
silence pervades the area, as if any sound is absorbed by the dark pond
itself.

58014.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: The sounds of birds and insects float on the air as the surrounding grass
of the Valley of the Elves swishes in a natural rhythm.  The temperature in
the valley seems to always stay temperate.  It is unclear if that is a result
of the unique geography of the area or an act of magic.

58025.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.

58021.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which
protects it from harsh weather and many outside visitors.  There is a group
of elves who call this valley home, however, caution is warranted as they are
notorious for being distrustful of outsiders.

58005.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x
description: A narrow cobblestone road leads north and south through the Valley
of the Elves.  All around lush green grasses grow, dotted with stands
of trees and patches of wildflowers.

58063.name: {GA Sm{gall Elven {wHo{Wme{x
description: This small home is comfortable and inviting.  The house is constructed
of wood that shows no sign of being cut, instead it appears to have been

58069.name: {&The D{*ock{7s of {*Th{&e Pond{x
description: A small wooden dock has been built here, extending out onto the still
waters of the dark pond.  To the north there is a very ramshackle little
hut.  A small amount of smoke wisps up out of a pipe chimney in the
ceiling, apparently indicating that someone lives there.

58077.name: {GEast{gern Sho{Gre of {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x

58053.name: {YTemple {gto {GSil{gva{ynus{x
description: This inside of this temple is full of more elements of nature than
what's found outside.  Two thick tree trunks grow right up in the center
of the room and out through openings in the roof.  There is an altar
beside the trees, made of stone and collected wood.  Many wild creatures
scamper about, apparently drawn to this place.

58080.name: {GE{gas{Gt of {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: This small, secluded valley is situated off of the main Valley of
the Elves.  There are many trees around and they all grow tall,
despite the relative shade of the rocky ridges surrounding the
valley.  To the west lies a large pond, its still waters shrouded

of elves who call this valley home, however, caution is warranted as they are

58051.name: {gTh{ye Ranger's Lo{gdge{x
description: This simple wooden building has a long table with many chairs pulled
up to it.  There are a variety of herbs hung among the rafters to dry,
filling the place with a very earthy scent.  There are several fine
animal pelts draped on racks very respectfully.

58092.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: Tall stands of trees are all about in this secluded sub-section of
the Valley of the Elves.  There is a general feeling of arcane energy
in the air and the natural elements in the area seem strengthened,
and perhaps a bit twisted, by it.  The valley is surrounded by rock
ledges, making it difficult to get in and out of.

58023.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x
description: This road leads north south through the wide open Valley of the Elves.
The road also slopes steeply upward here, climbing the ridge up out of
the valley. All about can be heard the vibrant sounds of nature.

58052.name: {GA Sm{gall Elven {wHo{Wme{x
description: This small home is comfortable and inviting.  The house is constructed
of wood that shows no sign of being cut, instead it appears to have been

58054.name: {CPawn{w-{Wo{w-{MRama{x
description: This small pawn shop can easy get filled with all manner of useful
and not so useful items, as long as people are selling.  There are
rows upon rows of shelves to hold merchandise and a very low counter
for the shopkeeper to stand behind.

58037.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.

58006.name: {*[{GThe E{glven Valle{Gy Road{*]{x
description: The road leading north and south through the valley isn't so much
paved as it is just a narrow path of well-worn rocks and gravel.
Tall grasses lead in all directions, dotted with the occasional tree.

58087.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.  A small opening
to the east leads to the main valley, where the elves reside.

58062.name: {*[{GElven Vi{gllage Sq{Guare{*]{x
description: {x
{gA terrace{Gd {Wsquare mark{ws the center of this sma{Wll elven village.  The{x
{gsquare {Gis{W paved in b{weautiful white marble an{Wd several potted trees and{x
{gflowe{Gri{Wng bushes a{wre placed all about.  On{W a raised tier in the center{x
{gof {Gth{We square is{w a beautiful fountain.  {WThe road lies west and the{x
{gs{Gqu{Ware continu{wes in all other directio{Wns.{x

58027.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: This secluded valley is surrounded on all sides by a rocky ridge which
protects it from harsh weather and many outside visitors.  There is a group
of elves who call this valley home, however, caution is warranted as they are
notorious for being distrustful of outsiders.

58060.name: {YHea{Wling {gGar{Gden{x
description: This lovely garden is sectioned off by a low fence made of fallen
branches.  There are open areas of soft grass shaded by full trees.
Patches of flowers grow in permanent bloom and small hummingbirds
flit from blossom to blossom.  This area is filled with relaxing
and healing energies.

58057.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.

58073.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: This large pond divides the secluded valley, stretching from the
northern ridge of the valley all the way to the southern.  The waters
are still and completely dark, making the depth seem eternal.  A complete
silence pervades the area, as if any sound is absorbed by the dark pond
itself.

58024.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58036.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: Here, on the edge of the Valley of the Elves, a tall rocky ridge rises
overhead.  The rim is too convex and the rocks too loose to be able to
reasonably climb out.  The lush greenery of the valley spreads out away
from the ridge, inviting exploration.

58082.name: On The {BTh{be D{Car{bk Po{Bnd{x
description: The waters of this large pond are completely dark and absolutely still,
making it impossible to determine its depth.  The mirror-like surface of
the water reflects the sky above, yet seems to suck any light or color
beneath the depths.  The pond reaches all the way across the secluded
valley.

58061.name: {GTh{ge Elven {*Forge{x
description: This rather large stone building is part forge, part blacksmith shop.
There are several large furnaces along one wall of the building, each
glowing and radiating heat from the fires inside.  There are several
work stations set up with anvils, buckets of water, and various tools.
Items for sale are hung upon the wall.  You can {Ylook{x at any item to see
its stats.
Object 'cloak brown cloth' is type armor, extra flags magic.
Weight is 0, value is 900, level is 13.
Armor class_ is 3 pierce, 3 bash, 3 slash, and 0 vs. magic.
Affects dexterity by 1.
Affects constitution by 1.
Object 'longsword elven sword long' is type weapon, extra flags magic.
Weight is 0, value is 670, level is 15.
Weapon type is sword.
Damage is 10d2 (average 15).
Weapons flags: sharp
Affects hit roll by 1.
Affects damage roll by 2.
Object 'chainmail elven chain mail shirt' is type armor, extra flags none.
Weight is 1, value is 1080, level is 15.
Armor class_ is 4 pierce, 4 bash, 4 slash, and 2 vs. magic.
Affects dexterity by 1.
Affects hp by 10.
Affects hit roll by 2.
Object 'longsword elven sword long' is type weapon, extra flags magic.
Weight is 0, value is 670, level is 15.
Weapon type is sword.
Damage is 10d2 (average 15).
Weapons flags: sharp
Affects hit roll by 1.
Affects damage roll by 2.
Object 'cloak brown cloth' is type armor, extra flags magic.
Weight is 0, value is 900, level is 13.
Armor class_ is 3 pierce, 3 bash, 3 slash, and 0 vs. magic.
Affects dexterity by 1.
Affects constitution by 1.
Object 'boots elven' is type armor, extra flags none.
Weight is 0, value is 390, level is 15.
Armor class_ is 3 pierce, 3 bash, 3 slash, and 0 vs. magic.
Affects dexterity by 1.
Affects strength by 1.
Affects hp by 5.
Affects moves by 15.
Object 'angel lance' is type weapon, extra flags rot_death.
Weight is 0, value is 350000, level is 20.
Weapon type is exotic.
Damage is 5d9 (average 25).
Affects dexterity by 2.
Affects constitution by 3.
Object 'chainmail elven chain mail shirt' is type armor, extra flags none.
Weight is 1, value is 1080, level is 15.
Armor class_ is 4 pierce, 4 bash, 4 slash, and 2 vs. magic.
Affects dexterity by 1.
Affects hp by 10.
Affects hit roll by 2.
Object 'angel lance' is type weapon, extra flags rot_death.
Weight is 0, value is 350000, level is 20.
Weapon type is exotic.
Damage is 5d9 (average 25).
Affects dexterity by 2.
Affects constitution by 3.

58055.name: {GEss{gentials of L{Gife{x
description: This building looks more like a large kitchen than an actual shop.
There are a few large ovens and a big table near them for preparing
food.  Bowls of gathered fresh fruit and nuts sit about, tempting
the tummy.

58094.name: {gA {gSecluded {GVal{gley{x
description: The sounds of nature seem somehow harsher and more amplified in this
small, secluded valley off the main Valley of the Elves.  There are
several tall trees spread throughout the valley, despite the relative
darkness cast by the rocky ridges surrounding the area.

58029.name: {gThe {GElven Val{gley{x
description: The green grass of the Valley of the Elves spreads out in all directions,
waving gently with the breeze.  There are scattered stands of trees along
with patches of wildflowers and sweet clover.  Animals, insects, and birds
abound, thriving in this beautiful setting.

58016.name: {ya{gn {renraged {yn{gym{yph{x~
description:
This nymph seems to be highly agitated about something.  She glares
about as if looking for something or someone.  Her normally beautiful
features are twisted up into a scowl and she looks ready to unleash
her magic on the first person she comes across.
58016.room_name: An enraged nymph blends into the surroundings.

58017.name: a {Bsa{bh{cua{bg{Bin{x~
description:
This sahuagin looks like some kind of monstrous cross between a fish
and a human.  There is a long, spiny fin running down its back and it
has scaly, webbed hands and feet tipped in black claws.
subroutines:
F vul I
F for G
M death 58009 40~
58017.room_name: A sahuagin swims here, quick to defend its territory.

58018.name: a {Rg{ria{mnt o{Rct{mop{rus{x~
description:
This octopus is so large it looks like it would be able to easily
sink your average rowboat.  Its tentacles are as thick as a man's
leg and it has two large black eyes, as big as dinner plates.
subroutines:
F vul I
F for G
F par ACHQV
M death 58011 40~
58018.room_name: A giant octopus slips silently through the water, hunting for prey.

58001.name: {yTa{Gh{gl{y'f{ga{Gr{ya{x, the ranger{x~
description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and
more agile.  He works diligently and with great reverence while he
prepares an animal hide.
subroutines:
M give 58012 58026~
M give 58010 58025~
M give 58008 58024~
M give 58006 58023~
M give 58004 58022~
M speech 58002 help~
M speech 58001 yes~
M greet 58000 100~
58001.room_name: A fit elven ranger is here methodically preparing an animal pelt.

58002.name: the priest of {GSil{gva{ynus{x~
description:
This elven priest wears rough spun brown robes and stands calmly
with his head bowed.  He offers assistance willingly to all in need
in the name of his god.
58002.room_name: A priest of Silvanus, wearing rough brown robes, stands here.

58003.name: {GM{gegi{Gl{x, the elven blacksmith~
description:
This rather strong-looking elf has deep tanned skin and and long, braided
brown hair.  Megil is surprisingly muscular for an elf and looks like he has
been forging weapons and armor for quite some time.
58003.room_name: An elven blacksmith works diligently on new items.

58004.name: {CGr{Bif{Gfo{x, the halfling shopkeeper~
description:
This halfling looks very happy to be running his own little pawn shop.
Apparently, Griffo has been friendly enough to the elves for them to allow
him to set up a shop in their village.  It would seem their distrust for
outsiders couldn't be good for business, though.
58004.room_name: A happy halfling stands behind the counter, ready to buy your items.

58005.name: {GV{gasa{x, the provisioner~
description:
This short and somewhat stocky elf wears a tidy apron and works about
the kitchen with grace and efficiency.  He looks rather young but his
confidence as he goes about his work seems to indicate he has been
preparing food for quite a long time.
58005.room_name: An elven man busies himself about the shop, preparing all the food.

58006.name: {GKe{gt{yh{ga{Gri{x~
description:
This nondescript elven man looks about warily.  He appears to be just
as suspicious about outsiders as many of his brethren.
58006.room_name: An elven man looks about warily.

58007.name: {GR{ga{ye{gr{Gi{x~
description:
This nondescript elven woman looks about warily.  She appears to be just
as suspicious about outsiders as many of her brethren.
58007.room_name: An elven woman goes about her business.

58008.name: {ga {yc{goos{yhe{ge{x~
description:
A beast is the size of the largest common dog.  It has a greenish coat with
brown spots.  Its shape, along with its colors, make this cooshee almost
undetectable as it moves.
58008.room_name: A rather large dog is here, wandering the valley.

58009.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf{x~
description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and more
agile.  There is a deep distrust in his eyes.  He goes about his business
swiftly and quietly while avoiding any contact with strangers.
58009.room_name: A male valley elf wanders here, wary of any intrusion.

58010.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf{x~
description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and more
agile.  There is a deep distrust in her eyes.  She goes about her business
swiftly and quietly while avoiding any contact with strangers.
58010.room_name: A female valley elf wanders here, wary of any intrusion.

58011.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {yscout{x~
description:
This elf is quick to notice any changes in the valley and is tasked with
reporting findings back to the elders.
58011.room_name: A valley elf scout wanders the valley, taking note of anything unusual.

58012.name: an {yan{wt{We{wl{yope{x~
description:
This stout creature has large horns and whitish spots over coarse,
brown hair.  This game most likely sustains not only the elves of
the valley, but many other wild creatures.
58012.room_name: An antelope is here, peacefully munching on grass.

58013.name: {ya {gvalley {yelf {*sentry{x~
description:
This elf is almost as tall as an average human, but much slimmer and
more agile.  Her hard eyes scan her surroundings, watching for any
disturbance.
58013.room_name: A valley elf sentry stands here, ready to attack any intruders.

58014.name: a giant {Wwhite spider{x~
description:
The pure whiteness of this spider might be beautiful if the creature's
size weren't so immense.  It has many black eyes which stand out strikingly
against the snow whiteness of its head.  A pair of 15 inch fangs look ready
to sink into unsuspecting prey.
58014.room_name: An enormous white spider scans the area with its many eyes.

58015.name: a {yforest {*roper{x~
description:
This roper sits absolutely motionless as it waits for prey to
come its way.  This variety has adapted to look like a dead tree
trunk, however, when a creature stumbles close enough, it will
entrap them in its many tentacles and drag the victim toward its
fanged mouth.
subroutines:
F for MV
F par BCGHIJ
M death 58005 30~
58015.room_name: Something that looks like a broken off dead tree trunk stands here.
